11.title: Guy in an all Girl's school.

112.content:
You had a visit up there to talk with the administration and review your profile. Woodland's agreed to enroll you, under one condition: You had to pretend to be a girl.

Since it was an all girls academy, they didn't want to have others think they were playing favorites. This meant that you were to dress as a girl.

Having no other options, your family agreed that this is what was best for you. Since you were petite anyways, you could pull this off.

There was a standard uniform; however, you still needed clothes for down time, so on the way home you went shopping. Your parents were unsure as to what freshman girls wore; but they tried their best while staying in the budget. They bought you everything that you might need, including UNDERWEAR!

When you returned home they decided that you should get used to acting and dressing like a girl. So you went up to your room and picked an outfit. The first thing you grabbed was the underwear. The underwear you got came in 10-packs, so you decided to pick the manliest pair. They were black with pink polka dots and pinks waist bands. They were size 14 and with a little bit of adjusting, they fit pretty well. You then threw on a white training bra that your mom got you. Next your threw on a plain white t-shirt. You then put on a blue and white striped romper. You remember seing girls in your high school wearing something like this. You then walked downstairs.

Your parents had a good laugh and poked fun but ultimately agreed you could pull of being a girl. Over the next week, your mom gave you as many fashion tips as she knew. She taught you to style your hair like a girl, how to do your makeup, and how to paint your nails. At the end of the week, you packed up and headed to school.

113.content:
You are Ace Thompson, a 16 year old 5'7" rebel with black hair. You aren't the biggest guy, but you refuse to let anyone tell you what to do. Even the law doesn't stop you. You're neither a nice or a good guy, but you don't care.

You get home late from a party and you find your parents waiting for you just inside.

"Son, we met a girl named Krystal today. Do you have anything to say?" Your dad asks.

You think and remember, Krystal was the girl you made fuck you before you would sell her drugs.

"No idea Dad." You lie.

"Don't fucking lie to me! I'm tired of your bullshit! I had to pay her off so she wouldn't go to the damn police. You need to learn your lesson and your mother and I have one last idea. We will be sending you to your Aunt Evelyn's school. Now give me your phone and go upstairs." You know better than to outright refuse him, you can always get your phone back later.

As you go upstairs you start thinking about what Aunt Evelyn said about her school. You never paid much attention, but you know it gets a lot of rebellious kids, and most of the graduates are stunning, so it might not be too bad.
113.title: You are being punished.

choices: You are going to have to hide as a female.
You will be dressed like the females, but they will know you are a guy.
You will stay as a guy.
1131.content:
It won't be that bad, you decide. Your Aunt Evelyn always seemed easy going, and the girls you've seen from there were all hot.

You get in bed and sleep the rest of the night away. About eight o'clock you hear knocking.

"Get up Ace, the Taxi is here." Your dad yells.

"What the Fuck? Can't I just fucking sleep?" You respond, but you start to get up anyway. Might as well get going.

"You don't need to take anything, just get dressed and get out there."

You toss on some clothes head out and get in the Taxi without so much as a goodbye for your family.

"I'm ready to go." You tell the driver.

"Alright." She responds and she heads out.

After sitting for a few minutes you realize something. "Hey, go back, I forgot my phone."

"Too bad, we're going." The driver responds.

"You are the one driving Me, I want you to go back."

"I don't work for you I work for the school. Deal with it." She then closes the glass between you two. You give up, lean back and fall asleep. Over the next five hours you fall in and out of sleep.

Once you get to the coast the driver honks to horn to wake you. "Wake up, let's go."

She get's out and you follow her. This is your first look at her and she is breathtaking. She's taller than you, even without her heels. Her athletic slim build is extenuated by the pants and blazer she is wearing. You follow her and she tells you to get onto a boat with her. You sit below deck with her while it is driven to the school. Your attempts at starting up a conversation are shot down.

Once the boat gets to the island she gets out and has you follow her.

"Where are we going?" you ask.

"To your aunt. Let's hurry." She starts walking. You didn't know she knew about that, but you just keep following. By this time it's gotten dark and there is no one outside. She leads you to what appears to be the back of the main building and directs you inside. Once inside you find yourself in your Aunt's office, just you and her.

"Hello Ace, time to get down to business."
1131.title: You go.

11311.content:
"I don't know whether you know this or not, but this is an all girl's school." She tells you.

"Alright." You respond. Doesn't seem half bad. These girl's must starving for sex, and you might be able to take advantage of it.

"But well, a lot of the parents that send their kids here do so because it is a n all girls school. You being here would change that."

"But I'm going here, right?" You question.

"Yes, of course. But well, it can't be public, so you are going to have to masquerade as a girl." She answers.

"Ha, that's funny." You respond.

"I'm not joking, not in the slightest. I know you won't like it but it is this or jail. That is how desperate your parent's have gotten." She grabs something from her desk. "I need you to get undressed, so we can start getting you ready."
11311.title: You are going to have to hide as a female.

1131111.content:
"Your roommate is Heather, she's a good student, and she is on the debate team (damn a nerd). You will share a bathroom with Charlotte, the hall's prefect, and her roommate Diane. They will not know of your situation, so make sure to keep the bathroom locked when you are in it." She grabs a stack out of her desk. "Here are your school handbook, and passkey. There is a map in the handbook, you are room 69 B. Have fun." She gives you a kiss on the cheek and steps out.

You are more confused than you've ever been, but you head to your room. Once you get there you try to use your passkey but it doesn't work. After a few tries, you give up and just knock.

You are incredibly surprised by the response. The door opens to reveal a topless and stunning girl.

"Yes, in fact, you are Adeline I presume."

"Uh, (that must me the name Aunt Evelyn gave me) yeah."

"Come on in." She steps out of your way. Once you step in she closes the door behind you. "So you are Ace? Don't look like much of a guy."

You get red, and a little angry. "You should see out of this ridiculous getup."

"Oh, don't get flustered. All you guy's see a little tit, and stop thinking straight. Although, I wouldn't call these little." She motions at her chest. "Just so you know, I'm doing this for three reasons. One, guys get funny around breasts, and two, you need to get used to it. We aren't nearly so modest without guys around. Oh, and the third, I think it's more comfortable."

You don't know why this is throwing you off so much, you've seen plenty of tits. "Well, thanks, I guess. Um... I'm going to go to bed if that is alright."

"Alright, you just need to put on a nightie, school policy. Weird rule, you can be as undressed as you want, but if you are sleeping you have to be in a nightie."

As you are getting undressed she makes a request. "Could you pull your panties down a bit, I want to see how it's taped, and how big of a problem we're dealing with." She winks. You comply and she notes "Oh, that's it."

You had always thought you had a big package. "Don't joke, I know I've got a big dick."

"Sorry but that just isn't true. Maybe you're a grower, I don't know. Well finish up." You decide to shut up, your pride's been hurt enough. You slide them back up and get your nightie on. It was comfortable but it seemed to extenuate your breasts. After such a strange day you fall asleep quickly.

After some strange dreams Heather wakes you up. "Get up, we have to get you ready for orientation."

You look around. Bricks lined the walkway to the front door of their house. You pick one up and throw it through Krystal's bedroom window. "I'll be back, Krystal! And next time Johnny won't be here to save you!"

135121.content:
Congratulations Felicity Knight,

You have been accepted into John Randolph Preparatory Academy. This acceptance shows you demonstrate the high qualities we strive to promote at JRPA. We hope you will come to our school. Orientation week is Aug 7-14 be there.

Sincerely,

Alexander Johnson
President John Randolph Preparatory Academy


The letter also has a schedule, a student handbook, a packing list, and complementary plane tickets to the school.

"Mom, I did it! I made it in." You yell.

"Congratulations sweety." She responds, "I knew you could do it."

"I'm going to start packing, right now orientation starts on Monday."

"Alright."

You head to your room and start packing. The packing list is for a guy, but that's understandable, the school only just opened to girls. It's easy enough to modify the list. Before long you've packed everything you own and you head out and buy the rest. You are easily packed before it is time for dinner.

Down at dinner your father congratulates you on your acceptance.

"Thanks Dad. I'm just anxious to get there now." You respond.

The rest of the weekend drags on until Sunday evening. You get to the airport and fly to the school. There is a school shuttle and you take it to the school. You are the only girl on the shuttle but it isn't too bad, you just catch a quick nap before you get to the school.

"Hey." You respond before going back to staring at your phone.

"After the first month. There is one thing though. We are going to have to move, and you are going to have to go to the school." It was a little annoying that you would be leaving your friends but you could make new ones, they weren't that great.

"Tomorrow, um... yeah. You should get a week of clothes packed, the rest will get shipped." Your mom looks like she has something else to say but you leave it be.

info.brief_description: Something is up at boarding school.
info.description:
Inspired both by http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1772377-Boarding-School and another Interactive that I can no longer find.

Rules:
Decent length chapters (Unless a choice is absolutely necessary)
No Toilet Play
No Pedophilia
Good Grammar

Other than that go wild.
